Sat, July 19, 2025 at 3:30 PM GMT+5:30 Four people in Florida have died this year from bacterial infections that can cause “flesh-eating” wounds, the state’s health department reported this month. The culprit, the bacteria Vibrio vulnificus, thrives in warm seawater. The...

articles.summary: Plague Death in Arizona Shows Insidious Disease Never Disappeared By THOMAS JEFFRIES, THE CONVERSATION Yersinia pestis is the bacteria that causes plague. (Callista Images/Getty Images) A person in Arizona has died from the plague, local health officials reported on Friday. This marks the first such death in this region in 18 years. But it's a stark reminder that this historic...
